text:
Nature Conservation (Open Seasons) Amendment (Deer) Order 2016

I make the following order under section 30(1) of the Nature Conservation Act 2002 .

16 December 2016

MATTHEW GROOM

Minister for Environment, Parks and Heritage

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Nature Conservation (Open Seasons) Amendment (Deer) Order 2016 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Principal Order
    In this order, the Nature Conservation (Open Seasons) Order 2004 is referred to as the Principal Order.

4.
    The amendments effected by this clause have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Nature Conservation (Open Seasons) Order 2004 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 21 December 2016

This order is administered in the Department of Primary Industries, Parks, Water and Environment.
